author: Tryon Edwards
message: He that never changes his opinions, never corrects his mistakes, and will never be wiser on the morrow than he is today.
title: Thought of the day

author: Abraham Lincoln
message: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
title: Thought of the day

author: E. M. Forster
message: One must be fond of people and trust them if one is not to make a mess of life.
title: Thought of the day

author: David Seamans
message: We cannot change our memories, but we can change their meaning and the power they have over us.
title: Thought of the day
